Content: # A Laravel Package that makes implementation of multiple payment Gateways endpoints and webhooks seamless [![Latest Version on Packagist](https://img.shields.io/packagist/v/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways.svg?style=flat-square)](https://packagist.org/packages/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways) ![Test Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/run-tests.yml?branch=main&label=Tests) ![Code Style Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/phpstan.yml?branch=main&label=Code%20Style) [![Total Downloads](https://img.shields.io/packagist/dt/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways.svg?style=flat-square)](https://packagist.org/packages/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways) The `laravel-multipayment-gateways` package provides a convenient way to handle payments through multiple payment gateways in a **Laravel 8, 9 and 10 application**. The package currently supports multiple gateways such as **Paystack**, **Flutterwave** and **Stripe**. The package offers an easy to use interface that abstracts the complexities of integrating with these payment gateways. It also provides a way to handle webhooks from the payment gateways. ## Documentation A comprehensive documentation is available to help you get started with the package [here](https://laravel-multipayment-gateways-xi.vercel.app) ## Testing
Translation: # Un package Laravel qui facilite l’implémentation de multiples points de terminaison et webhooks de passerelles de paiement [![Dernière version sur Packagist](https://img.shields.io/packagist/v/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways.svg?style=flat-square)](https://packagist.org/packages/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways) ![Statut des tests](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/run-tests.yml?branch=main&label=Tests) ![Statut du style de code](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/phpstan.yml?branch=main&label=Style%20de%20code) [![Téléchargements totaux](https://img.shields.io/packagist/dt/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways.svg?style=flat-square)](https://packagist.org/packages/musahmusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways) Le package `laravel-multipayment-gateways` offre un moyen pratique de gérer les paiements via plusieurs passerelles de paiement dans une **application Laravel 8, 9 et 10**. Le package supporte actuellement plusieurs passerelles telles que **Paystack**, **Flutterwave** et **Stripe**. Le package propose une interface facile à utiliser qui abstrait les complexités liées à l’intégration avec ces passerelles de paiement. Il fournit également un moyen de gérer les webhooks provenant des passerelles de paiement. ## Documentation Une documentation complète est disponible pour vous aider à démarrer avec le package [ici](https://laravel-multipayment-gateways-xi.vercel.app) ## Tests

RowTranslations.originContent: # A Laravel Package that makes implementation of multiple payment Gateways endpoints and webhooks seamless
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # Un package Laravel qui facilite l’implémentation de multiples points de terminaison et webhooks de passerelles de paiement

RowTranslations.originContent: The `laravel-multipayment-gateways` package provides a convenient way to handle payments through multiple payment gateways in a **Laravel 8, 9 and 10 application**.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Le package `laravel-multipayment-gateways` offre un moyen pratique de gérer les paiements via plusieurs passerelles de paiement dans une **application Laravel 8, 9 et 10**.

RowTranslations.originContent: The package currently supports multiple gateways such as **Paystack**, **Flutterwave** and **Stripe**.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Le package supporte actuellement plusieurs passerelles telles que **Paystack**, **Flutterwave** et **Stripe**.

RowTranslations.originContent: The package offers an easy to use interface that abstracts the complexities of integrating with these payment gateways.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Le package propose une interface facile à utiliser qui abstrait les complexités liées à l’intégration avec ces passerelles de paiement.

RowTranslations.originContent: It also provides a way to handle webhooks from the payment gateways.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Il fournit également un moyen de gérer les webhooks provenant des passerelles de paiement.

RowTranslations.originContent: A comprehensive documentation is available to help you get started with the package [here](https://laravel-multipayment-gateways-xi.vercel.app)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Une documentation complète est disponible pour vous aider à démarrer avec le package [ici](https://laravel-multipayment-gateways-xi.vercel.app)

Content:
## Changelog

Please see [CHANGELOG](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MusahMusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/main/CHANGELOG.md) for more information on what has changed recently.

## Contributing

Please see [CONTRIBUTING](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MusahMusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.

## Security Vulnerabilities

Please review [our security policy](../../security/policy) on how to report security vulnerabilities.

## Credits

- [MusahMusah](https://github.com/MusahMusah)
- [Cybernerdie](https://github.com/cybernerdie)
- [All Contributors](../../contributors)

## License

The MIT License (MIT). Please see [License File](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MusahMusah/laravel-multipayment-gateways/main/LICENSE.md) for more information.
